## Description {#details}

The custom lattice function used by the generic sparse propagation solver.

It handles merging lattice values and computing new lattice values for constants, arguments, values returned from trackable functions, and values located in trackable global variables. It also computes the lattice values that change as a result of executing instructions.

Definition at line 115 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### ComputeInstructionState() {#a07b5f3acfce195f2c0a986f1a5e4ae4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::ComputeInstructionState (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a>, 16 &gt; &amp; ChangedValues, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparsesolver">SparseSolver</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> &gt; &amp; SS)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute the lattice values that change as a result of executing the given instruction.

The changed values are stored in <code>ChangedValues</code>. We handle just a few kinds of instructions since we&#39;re only propagating values that can be called.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00171">171</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getIndirectCalls() {#a55c60f0886755f1d37ce6220d23ec4bc}

  labels = {["inline"]}>
We collect a set of indirect calls when visiting call sites.

This method returns a reference to that set.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00220">220</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.

### MergeValues() {#a0011b8df581b97747a420890826a7eeb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CVPLatticeVal anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::MergeValues (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> X, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> Y)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Merge the two given lattice values.

The interesting cases are merging two FunctionSet values and a FunctionSet value with an Undefined value. For these cases, we simply union the function sets. If the size of the union is greater than the maximum functions we track, the merged value is overdefined.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### computeConstant() {#a1c55f3a97181f269156b826a7c55b4b6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CVPLatticeVal anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::computeConstant (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; C)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute a new lattice value for the given constant.

The constant, after stripping any pointer casts, should be a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>. We ignore null pointers as an optimization, since calling these values is undefined behavior.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.

### visitCallBase() {#a25fde0929ac4c41e8ea4fb0cb58cf9e8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::visitCallBase (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp; CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a>, 16 &gt; &amp; ChangedValues, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparsesolver">SparseSolver</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> &gt; &amp; SS)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Handle call sites.

The state of a called function&#39;s formal arguments is the merge of the argument state with the call sites corresponding actual argument state. The call site state is the merge of the call site state with the returned value state of the called function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00260">260</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### visitLoad() {#a915f4f9419abdf3719dc5db0ad525372}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::visitLoad (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a>, 16 &gt; &amp; ChangedValues, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparsesolver">SparseSolver</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> &gt; &amp; SS)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Handle load instructions.

If the pointer operand of the load is a global variable, we attempt to track the value. The loaded value state is the merge of the loaded value state with the global variable state.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00318">318</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Handle return instructions.

The function&#39;s return state is the merge of the returned value state and the function&#39;s return state.

### visitStore() {#a5622d73374d4e7083c41cf5b27ae8ad2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::visitStore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a>, 16 &gt; &amp; ChangedValues, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparsesolver">SparseSolver</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/#ad7f1b84f271a81d82529c9325b602ac5">CVPLatticeKey</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-calledvaluepropagation-cpp-/cvplatticeval">CVPLatticeVal</a> &gt; &amp; SS)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Handle store instructions.

If the pointer operand of the store is a global variable, we attempt to track the value. The global variable state is the merge of the stored value state with the global variable state.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00335">335</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### IndirectCalls {#a31556d2c0d0852914df4fd0c965cf450}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallPtrSet&lt;CallBase &#42;, 32&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CalledValuePropagation.cpp&#125;::CVPLatticeFunc::IndirectCalls</>}>
Holds the indirect calls we encounter during the analysis.

We will attach metadata to these calls after the analysis indicating the functions the calls can possibly target.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp/#l00226">226</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/calledvaluepropagation-cpp">CalledValuePropagation.cpp</a>.
